abstract: Azerbaijan government pardons 148 political prisoners in what appears to be move to appease human rights critics.

headline.print_headline: Azerbaijan: Critics of Government Freed in Amnesty
headline.main: Azerbaijan: Critics of Government Freed in Amnesty

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Azerbaijan’s government pardoned 148 prisoners, including journalists, human rights activists and political opponents on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Azerbaijan’s government pardoned 148 prisoners, including journalists, human rights activists and political opponents on Thursday.
